title: Uncle Tom's Cabin - behavior of the traveller

content.question: The behavior of the traveller with regard to his “valise and umbrella” (third sentence of paragraph 2) is used as

choices.label: an example of the traveller’s fastidious character
an explanation of the traveller’s role in the story
a warning about the lure of material possessions
a reminder of the hostile atmosphere in the room

content.answer: an example of the traveller’s fastidious character

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
